song.englishname: J.E. Picturephone (Reflect You, I Connect You)

english.segment2: I connect. We sort through discreet compartments. I connect. Buttons pop and click toward your requirements
english.segment3: Reflect you, I connect. Reflect you, I connect. Reflect you, I connect. I connect, I connect
english.segment4: I connect. We view graphs of distinct colors. I connect. Interlocked displays of interacting moderns
english.segment5: Reflect you, I connect. Reflect you, I connect. Reflect you, I connect. I connect, I connect
english.segment6: We stay friends through wire and cable. I connect. Pick up the reciever as all else fails
